swiftlanguage.title: English (U.S.)
swiftlanguage.author: QuickSupport
swiftlanguage.phrase: %s is already subscribed to the news feed.
Thank you. Please check your email to confirm your subscription.
You have been unsubscribed from our news feed - sorry to see you go!
Thank you for subscribing to our news feed. You will need to validate your subscription in order to receive updates. Please click on the link below to activate your subscription.
Please let us know if we can be of any further assistance,
Your subscription to our news feed has been confirmed. You will now receive updates from us whenever we post a new article. You can unsubscribe at any time by clicking on the link below.
We encountered a problem (invalid subscriber hash)
Sorry, we were unable to find this news article.
